thread.title: Married at First Sight 2017: Alene blasted for making Simon get a haircut

author: Bronte Coy
title: Married at First Sight 2017: Alene blasted for making Simon get a haircut
text:
MARRIED At First Sight bride Alene has received major backlash online after insisting on giving her new â€˜husbandâ€™ Simon a full makeover on the show â€” including a dramatic haircut.
In a scene that surprised absolutely no one who saw Aleneâ€™s face when Simon first appeared in front of her with his mop of curly hair, the farmer finally succumbed to his fate last night and allowed a hairdresser to change his look .
But it was clear he wasnâ€™t happy about it, and was suggesting a trim before his partnerâ€™s begging eventually won and he accepted defeat.
This about sums up Simonâ€™s feelings toward the situation. Source: Channel 9
After the cut, Aleneâ€™s lukewarm attraction to Simon appeared to skyrocket, with the nurse gushing about how â€œhotâ€ he looked, saying: â€œI canâ€™t express how appreciative I am.â€
It may have all appeared rosy on-screen, but fans on Twitter were quick to slam Alene for being so â€œshallow.â€
Quote: : â€œAlene back off! You didnâ€™t marry a good bloke to make him someone else â€” let him be and find someone who fits your shallow ideals.â€
Others were a little softer in their approach.
â€œSimon you look great! And for the record. I thought you looked great with the curls too.â€
